\section*{BeaconResponse - a Perl CGI for Beacon+ queries on GA4GH compatible databases}

\subsection*{Query parameters}

\begin{itemize}
\item datasetId

\begin{itemize}
\item the dataset to be queried
\item example: \texttt{arraymap}, which will expand to \texttt{arraymap\_ga4gh} as database name
\item default: \texttt{arraymap}
\end{itemize}
\item assemblyId

\begin{itemize}
\item the genome assembly
\item example: \texttt{GRCh38}
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Database naming}

The script uses some naming conventions for databases and collections:

\begin{itemize}
\item MongoDB database (in our implementation)

\begin{itemize}
\item datasetId\texttt{\_ga4gh}
\end{itemize}
\item collections

\begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{individuals}
\item \texttt{biosamples}
\item \texttt{callsets}
\item \texttt{variants}
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Example use, web call:}

SNV query on dataset "dipg" with phenotype response:

\begin{itemize}
\item http://progenetix.org/beacon/query/?eferenceName=17\&referenceBases=G\&variants.alternate\emph{bases=A\&variants.start=7577121\&dataset}ids=dipg\&phenotypes=1
\end{itemize}

CNV query on dataset "dipg", with phenotype response:

\begin{itemize}
\item http://progenetix.org/beacon/query/?eferenceName=9\&alternateBases=DEL\&startMin=19000000\&startMax=21984490\&endMin=21984490\&endMax=25000000\&dataset\_ids=dipg\&phenotypes=1
\end{itemize}

CNV query (defaults do dataset "arraymap") with bio-metadata component and phenotype response:

\begin{itemize}
\item http://progenetix.org/beacon/query/?eferenceName=chr9\&alternateBases=DEL\&startMin=20000000\&startMax=21984490\&endMin=21984490\&endMax=25000000\&biosamples.bio\emph{characteristics.ontology}terms.term\emph{id=NCIT:C3058\&biosamples.bio}characteristics.ontology\emph{terms.term}id=NCIT:C3059\&phenotypes=1
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
